extension.author: Eric Debienne
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: Plugin for Hikashop Business/Essential and hikamarket to attribute a group to a user on user registeration depending login/pwd.

field.name: fieldname
field.description: The custom field name in Hikashop you want to use (support only dropdown and radio menus)\nDefault: status;
field.label: Field name

field.name: removefromreg
field.description: Do you wish to remove the user from the default registered group?\nUsually should be yes.
field.label: Remove from default

field.name: automaticlogin
field.description: Do you wish to automatically log-in the user after a successful registration?\nDoes not log-in if activation is required.
field.label: Automatic Login

server.name: User Group FTW For Hikashop Update
